content:
This is your first Nussknacer instance. You can play with it to see what you can do with Nu Cloud.

Click the link to open Nussknacker Designer.

This is a list of your scenarios. We created an example scenario for you.

Open it to see what it does, how you can send some data to Nussknacker and how Nussknacker reacts.

The first node of every scenario defines the source of data the scenario is processing.

Double-click it to see what is the source of data in our example.

*http.example-input* is the input topic of this scenario. Communication with topics in Nu Cloud (sending and receiving events) is over HTTP. To send an input event, you can for example: -
execute this curl command (click to expand) curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u publisher: %%password%% https://%%tenant%%-gateway.staging-cloud.nussknacker.io/topics/http.example-input -d '{ "name": "Nutcracker" }'
- use your browser to send an HTTP request by clicking here After you have sent the event go to the Next step
